name: SQuery
tagline: The S is for Speed! or possibly Simple...
body:
### Welcome to SQuery.
SQuery is a simple Javscript Library I have put together to ease the transition from JQuery to Vanilla JS.

### Why ditch JQuery?
So JQuery is great... It's simple and easy to use. But if your anything like me you probably only use 10% of it, if that. Upon checking out the articles and videos below I decided Vanilla Javascript was the way to go. 

* [youmightnotneedjquery.com](http://youmightnotneedjquery.com)
* [gomakethings.com/ditching-jquery-for-vanilla-js](http://gomakethings.com/ditching-jquery-for-vanilla-js)
* [Todd Motto - Demystifying JavaScript: you don't need jQuery (FOWD 2014)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=keyCg253S-o)

### But a bunch of the stuff I use is dependant on JQuery...
## Bootstrap
This put me off at first too. The main culprit being bootstrap. However I came across [thednp.github.io/bootstrap.native](http://thednp.github.io/bootstrap.native/) which solved that problem.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
